items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's perfect
items.body: I wasn't expecting much for the dress. When I got it. I was in shock! It's beautiful and the material is nice. It's not itchy at all. It's true to fit sizing. It fits like a glove. For the price it's worth it. Definitely recommend if you're looking for a prom dress and don't want to spend $100s The tag says it's 100% polyester. One thing I forgot to say. The little rhinestones do fall off but nothing drastic. Still looks beautiful after 8 hours of dancing in it! Read more
items.author: kirstie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars beautiful dress
items.body: i wore this dress for a very special event & i lovedd it . it fit perfectly and the quality was amazing. it was very comfortable and i would definitely order again . 100% recommended Read more
items.author: dress

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning!
items.body: I wore this for a Japan themed prom! It's absolutely beautiful it was amazing and stunning in every lighting and photo! It makes your back look amazing! The lining under is super smooth and not see though at all! It has a train and is very very pretty, overall stunning! Be careful though, the straps are kinda weak and since it's thin might pinch at sensitive skin. Read more
items.author: VP

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Mermaid Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Mermaid Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Desert Rose, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Peacock, Lake Blue, Lavender, Royal Blue, Turquoise, Sky Blue, Burgundy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
